meanings.definition: The quality of having a clear intention or goal.
meanings.sent1: Her purposefulness in completing the project on time impressed her boss.
meanings.sent2: His purposefulness in saving money for a new car paid off in the end.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel's purposefulness in gathering acorns for winter was both cute and efficient.
meanings.sent4: The purposefulness of the ant colony working together was like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The purposefulness of the marathon runner as he crossed the finish line was inspiring.

meanings.definition: Acting with determination and focus towards a specific objective.
meanings.sent1: The purposefulness student studied diligently for the exam.
meanings.sent2: The purposefulness chef prepared the meal with precision and care.
meanings.sent3: The purposefulness cat stalked its prey with unwavering focus.
meanings.sent4: The purposefulness leader guided the team to success with unwavering determination.
meanings.sent5: The purposefulness firefighter rushed into the burning building to save lives without hesitation.
